backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles, app settings, sermon cache, and app releases with access control checks for user and admin permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/docs/android-webview-template.m: Documentation providing a minimal Android Studio WebView template for wrapping the web app as a native Android app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode values, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and mounting the React app root with main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the app shell, navigation, header, and all major tabs with decorative backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Placeholder AuthButton component that returns null.
frontend/src/components/MobileTabsNav.ts: Mobile tab navigation component using shadcn Tabs with themed backgrounds and overflow menu.
frontend/src/components/SelectLocationPr: Card component prompting users to select a location, with an icon and navigation callback.
frontend/src/components/TabsOverflowMenu: Renders an overflow dropdown menu of tab options with icons and calls onSelectTab when an item is chosen.
Provides static data arrays for morning and evening adhkar items with text, translations, and repetition counts.
frontend/src/features/adhkar/MorningEven: Displays morning and evening adhkar lists with checkboxes and reset controls, persisting completion state via settings.
frontend/src/features/app-release/curren: Exports the hardcoded current app semantic version string.
frontend/src/features/app-release/semver: Implements semantic version comparison and a helper to check if one version is newer.
frontend/src/features/app-release/Update: Shows a dismissible update alert when a newer backend app version exists and links to the store page.
frontend/src/features/app-release/update: Handles storing, retrieving, and clearing dismissed update-version data in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useIsC: React Query hook checking admin status via the actor's isCallerAdmin method.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useLat: React Query hook fetching latest app release metadata from the backend with graceful fallbacks.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useUpd: Mutation hook to update latest app release metadata and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/features/dua-guide/duaGuide: Dua ve kategori tiplerini tanımlar ve çeşitli kategorilere göre dua listesini içerir.
frontend/src/features/dua-guide/DuaGuide: Renders dua categories and lists, with a dialog showing full details for a selected dua.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Esmaül Hüsna öğelerini kart olarak gösteren ve seçim olayını tetikleyen bir bileşen.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/esmaul: Esmaül Hüsna öğeleri için veri modelini ve 99 isimden oluşan listeyi sağlar.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Esmaül Hüsna listesini kart grid olarak gösterir ve seçilen isim için detay diyaloğu açar.
frontend/src/features/fasting-tracker/Fa: Nafile ve kaza oruçlarını, hedefleri ve Ramazan gün durumlarını yönetip kaydeden ana takip bileşeni.
frontend/src/features/fasting-tracker/Ra: Ramazan ayı 30 günlük oruç durumlarını gösteren, ilerlemeyi hesaplayan ve sıfırlama seçeneği sunan arayüz bölümü.
frontend/src/features/hatim/HatimTakipTa: Provides a UI to track Quran reading progress, allowing page input, increment/decrement, reset, and saving to settings.
frontend/src/features/home/currentPrayer: Calculates the current prayer slot based on adjusted prayer times and helper conversion to minutes.
frontend/src/features/home/HomeTab.tsx: Displays daily prayer info, next prayer countdown, and weather, with location setup and kerahat-aware prayer times.
frontend/src/features/home/MotifButton.t: Wraps a styled button with an Islamic pattern overlay for decorative UI consistency.
frontend/src/features/home/MotifFrame.ts: Renders a frame component with optional ornamental corners or divider flourish around its children.
frontend/src/features/home/NextPrayerCou: Shows the upcoming prayer time and countdown, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/features/home/PrayerTimeCar: Displays clickable cards for verse, hadith, dua, and esma content tied to the current prayer slot.
frontend/src/features/home/time-content/: Contains a list of dua items with Arabic text, Turkish translations, and usage occasions.
Defines a HadithItem interface and exports an array of short hadith entries with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and sources.
Defines a VerseItem interface and exports an array of Quran verse entries with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and references.
frontend/src/features/home/useCurrentPra: React hook that determines the current prayer slot and updates it every minute.
frontend/src/features/home/useNextPrayer: React hook that finds the next prayer time and calculates remaining time, updating every minute.
frontend/src/features/home/usePrayerTime: Selects deterministic random verse, hadith, dua, and Esma content per prayer slot using a seeded picker.
frontend/src/features/location/LocationS: UI component for searching, selecting, and saving a user’s location via geocoding results.
frontend/src/features/location/openMeteo: Provides functions to search locations using Open-Meteo’s API and convert results into app-specific location objects.
frontend/src/features/location/types.ts: Defines Location and GeocodingResult TypeScript interfaces.
frontend/src/features/location/useGeocod: React Query hook for performing debounced geocoding searches with caching and retry logic.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/Nam: Renders a guided prayer tutorial with rakat info and gender-specific step sequences.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/nam: Defines interfaces and data for prayer steps and rakat counts, including detailed male prayer steps and placeholders for female steps.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/dista: Implements Haversine distance calculation and formatting utilities for displaying distances.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/Nearb: Provides a UI component to search and select a location using geocoding results with temporary or saved options.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/nearb: Fetches nearby mosques from the Overpass API, extracts details, computes distances, and returns a sorted list.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/Nearb: Main tab for listing nearby mosques, handling location selection, radius filtering, and search display logic.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/types: Defines the NearbyMosque TypeScript interface with ID, name, coordinates, distance, and optional address.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/useNe: React Query hook that fetches nearby mosques based on coordinates and radius, with caching and retry logic.
frontend/src/features/notifications/noti: Contains notification templates for prayer times and helpers to format messages with optional time/lead info.
frontend/src/features/prayer-tracker/Pra: Prayer tracking UI allowing users to mark daily prayers and manage kaza counts stored in app settings.
Fetches daily prayer times from the Aladhan API and maps the response to a normalized PrayerTimes object.
frontend/src/features/prayer/kerahatTime: Computes kerahat time windows and merges them with prayer times into a chronologically sorted list.
frontend/src/features/prayer/PrayerTimes: Renders prayer times with user-configurable offsets and kerahat windows, handling loading, errors, and location selection.
Applies minute offsets to individual prayer times or an entire prayer time set.
frontend/src/features/prayer/usePrayerTi: React Query hook that loads prayer times for a given location with caching and retry logic.
frontend/src/features/qibla/QiblaFinderT: Provides a UI for locating the Qibla direction using device orientation and user-selected location.
frontend/src/features/qibla/qiblaMath.ts: Calculates the Qibla bearing from any coordinate using great-circle math and normalizes angles.
frontend/src/features/qibla/useDeviceOri: Hook that reads device orientation heading, handling permissions and feature support across platforms.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/qura: Fetches Qur'an surah metadata, ayah text, translations, and audio with caching via the Al-Quran Cloud API.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/Qura: Displays a surah list and reader with audio playback, translation toggling, and persistent reading progress.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/useA: React hook managing audio playback for ayahs, including loading, errors, navigation, and automatic next‑ayah behavior.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/useQ: Stores and updates last-read surah, ayah, and scroll position using app settings.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/fastingBas: Static content describing fasting basics, rules, and guidance.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/ramadanMen: Provides structured sahur and iftar menus for each day of Ramadan.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/RamazanKos: UI component showing Ramadan info, prayer times, location setup, tarawih info, and daily rotating menu.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/tarawihCon: Static content explaining terawih prayer details and practices.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/useDailyRo: Hook selecting the current day's Ramadan menu and updating it automatically at midnight.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/dat: Utility functions for day-start normalization, day-difference calculation, and Turkish date formatting.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/hij: Converts Hijri events to Gregorian dates by scanning a year using Intl Islamic calendar data.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/rel: Static dataset of all Islamic days in 2026 with fixed Gregorian dates and Hijri mappings.
TypeScript interfaces defining Hijri events and computed Gregorian religious day objects.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/Rel: React component showing 2026 Islamic days, highlighting the next upcoming day and listing all days with status badges.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/use: Hook returning 2026 religious days plus the next upcoming day and days remaining.
frontend/src/features/sermon/CumaHutbesi: Empty placeholder file for the Friday sermon tab component.
frontend/src/features/sermon/useLatestSe: Empty placeholder file for a hook to fetch the latest sermon.
frontend/src/features/settings/AdminAppR: Admin-only UI for updating app release version and Play Store URL with validation and success feedback.
frontend/src/features/settings/appSettin: Type definitions for app settings including location, notifications, fasting, Quran progress, and prayer data.
frontend/src/features/settings/localSett: Defines local settings schema, defaults, and versioned loading with migrations from localStorage.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsT: User settings UI for time offset, prayer notifications, and access to admin release controls.
frontend/src/features/settings/useAppSet: Provides React Query hooks to load, update, and persist app settings merged with defaults.
frontend/src/features/tasbihat/tasbihatD: Exports static tasbihat items including text, translations, and repetition counts.
frontend/src/features/tasbihat/TasbihatT: Renders a scrollable list of tasbihat items with Arabic text, translations, and counts.
frontend/src/features/weather/CompactWea: Shows a small inline weather summary based on the user’s selected location.
frontend/src/features/weather/openMeteoW: Fetches current weather data from Open‑Meteo and maps weather codes to descriptions.
frontend/src/features/weather/useWeather: React Query hook to fetch weather data for a given location with caching and retries.
frontend/src/features/weather/WeatherSec: Displays a detailed weather card with temperature, description, wind, and humidity.
frontend/src/features/zikirmatik/Zikirma: Implements a digital tasbih counter UI with target settings and progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, loading saved identities, and exposing login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme variables, dark mode colors, and utility background patterns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/nativeNotifications.t: Implements safe wrappers for sending native Android notifications via the WebView bridge and checking support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, layouts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state focused on enabling Quran ayah audio playback, listing requirements, issues, and feature requests.
